body:
Import JSON

mongoimport --db "dbName" --collection "collName" --type json --file "fileName.json" --jsonArray

JSON format should be in this format.

[
    { name: "Name1", msg: "This is msg 1" },
    { name: "Name2", msg: "This is msg 2" },
    { name: "Name3", msg: "This is msg 3" }
]

Import CSV

mongoimport --db "dbName" --collection "collName" --type csv --file "fileName.json" --headerline
title: Proper way to import json file to mongo
